Ultimate Warriors
 




Even while hurting, Baron Davis is brilliant in the huge victory.  (AP)



    

    

      The impossible happens. Golden State, the eighth seed in the West, stuns 
      the basketball world by downing top-seeded Dallas 111-86 to claim the 
      series 4-2 and produce one of the greatest upsets in history. Full 
      story

 Ducks down Canucks in 2OT, advance to Western finals


    

      
      The Ducks finish off the Canucks 2-1 to advance to the final four. 
      Anaheim's Jean-Sebastien 
      Giguere makes 26 saves and Scott Niedermayer's goal seals 
      the win in 2OT.
    

  
• Goldstein: Canucks feel big hurt | Matchup | Bracket


 

 





 Miller's Insider: Nationals not as bad as lousy start


    

      
      At 1-8, the Nats looked 
      like the biggest D.C. losers since Dukakis and Goldwater. But young arms 
      have helped raise hopes that they'll avoid the fate of the '03 Tigers.
